meanings.definition: A mountain range in northern England.
meanings.sent2: We hiked through the Pennines last summer.
meanings.sent3: The sheep in the Pennines must have the best view!
meanings.sent4: The Pennines stood tall like ancient guardians.
meanings.sent5: The Pennines loomed majestically in the distance.

meanings.definition: A region in northern England where the Pennine mountains are located.
meanings.sent1: The Pennines cover a vast area.
meanings.sent2: Many villages are nestled in the Pennines.
meanings.sent3: I wish I could live in the cozy Pennines!
meanings.sent4: The Pennines are like a protective embrace around the towns.
meanings.sent5: The Pennines create a natural barrier against the elements.
